alert.note: Alert for Wilson (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 01 at 4:41AM CDT until June 02 at 6:17PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kansas... Fall River at Fredonia affecting Wilson County. For the Fall River...including Fredonia...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING TO TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Fall River at Fredonia. * WHEN...From early this morning to tomorrow evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:31 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 18.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 22.0 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Fall River Fredonia 17.0 18.3 Wed 4 am CDT 16.5 6.7 6.4 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Do not drive into flooded areas or go around barricades. Nearly two feet of water will carry most vehicles away. Turn around, don`t drown.
